snippet: The new monument to Franklin Delano Roosevelt is mired in a legal dispute over how prominently the foundations that gave money will be acknowledged.
abstract: Dedication of monument to Franklin Delano Roosevelt on Roosevelt Island, designed by architect Louis I Kahn, is mired in a legal dispute between two major donors to the Franklin D Roosevelt Four Freedoms Park and its backers; at issue is how prominently the donors, the Reed Foundation and the Alphawood Foundation, will be acknowledged at the site, and where.
lead_paragraph: The new monument to Franklin Delano Roosevelt is mired in a legal dispute over how prominently the foundations that gave money will be acknowledged.

headline.seo: F.D.R. Monument Mired in a Legal Dispute Over Placement of Donors’ Names
headline.main: A Monument to Roosevelt, on the Eve of Dedication, Is Mired in a Dispute With Donors
headline.print_headline: Monument to Roosevelt, on Eve of Dedication, Is Mired in a Dispute With Donors

keywords.value: Roosevelt, Franklin D, Four Freedoms Park (NYC)
